text: “Kodi mukuganiza kuti mukalowa ku Munda wamtendere pomwe sanakudzereni masautso olingana (ndi omwe) adawapeza amene adamuka kale inu musanabadwe? Kusauka ndi matenda zidawakhudza, ndipo adanjenjemeretsedwa koopsa kufikira mtumiki pamodzi ndi amene adakhulupirira naye adati: “Chipulumutso cha Allah chibwera liti?” Dziwani kuti ndithu chipulumutso cha Allah chili pafupi
